answer:
The time zones in the USA are in the Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) offsets. The time zones in the USA are divided into 11 time zones. 

The eleven time zones are, in order from East to West:
1. Eastern Time Zone (ET) (-5 hours from UTC)
2. Central Time Zone (CT) (-6 hours from UTC)
3. Mountain Time Zone (MT) (-7 hours from UTC)
4. Pacific Time Zone (
question: where are the timezones in the usa
